<<<<<<< HEAD
An Excellent new song call'd The hard-hearted lady, or, The young man dy'd for love being a relation of a yound lady that was engag'd to a seaman, and married another while he was a shipboard.
1 broadside.
Printed and sold by T. Moore, [London] : [1684]
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing. Reproduction of original in the Magdalene College Library, Cambridge University. With: An answer to the the [sic] unfortunate lady who hang'd her self in dispair.
=======
An Excellent new song call'd The hard-hearted lady, or, The young man dy'd for love being a relation of a yound lady that was engag'd to a seaman, and married another while he was a shipboard.
1 broadside.
Printed and sold by T. Moore, [London] : [1684]
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing. Reproduction of original in the Magdalene College Library, Cambridge University. With: An answer to the the [sic] unfortunate lady who hang'd her self in dispair.
T. Moore
